service2_test module

service2_test.client()[source]

Fixture to configure the Flask app in testing mode, provide a test client, and create the inventory table for testing.

Returns:

Flask test client

Return type:

FlaskClient

service2_test.new_item_data()[source]

Fixture to provide data for adding a new item to the inventory.

Returns:

New item data

Return type:

dict

service2_test.test_api_add_item(client, new_item_data)[source]

Test adding a new item to the inventory through the API.

Parameters:

  • client (FlaskClient) – Flask test client

  • new_item_data (dict) – Data for adding a new item

service2_test.test_api_deduce_item_from_stock(client)[source]

Test deducing a specified quantity from the stock of an item through the API.

Parameters:

client (FlaskClient) – Flask test client

service2_test.test_api_get_all_items(client)[source]

Test retrieving details of all items in the inventory through the API.

Parameters:

client (FlaskClient) – Flask test client

service2_test.test_api_get_item_by_id(client)[source]

Test retrieving details of a specific item by its ID through the API.

Parameters:

client (FlaskClient) – Flask test client

service2_test.test_api_update_item(client)[source]

Test updating details of an item in the inventory through the API.

Parameters:

client (FlaskClient) – Flask test client
